[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”2″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”95″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”100″ shift_y=”0″ style=”inherited”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ overlay_alpha=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ zoom_width=”0″ zoom_height=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1487095243601{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”85″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”fontsize-145926″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″]We know what’s most important to you. That’s why we’re here to help you find work. With 10 offices located nationwide, our exclusive Digital Marketing and IT staffing services will match you with the specialized jobs you’ve been looking for. Whether you’re looking to add to your freelance hustle, test out a potential employer through a contract-to-hire opportunity, or land stability with a full-time placement, we have the exclusive access you need to the latest Digital Marketing and Tech job openings.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”89″ position_horizontal=”right” gutter_size=”2″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1487092904433{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”fontsize-155944″ text_font=”font-117804″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-gyho”]

How It Works

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” text_size=”h6″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”100″ subheading=”If it checks out, we’ll route it to the correct department to initiate the job search process. “]Upload your resume.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” text_size=”h6″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ subheading=”We know you’re more than a piece of paper. One of our dedicated recruiters will work to learn more about who you are and the opportunity you’re looking for.”]Tell us about yourself.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” text_size=”h6″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”300″ subheading=”Through our use of the latest sophisticated technologies, you’ll receive job alerts for positions that match your skill sets and work experience.”]Respond to job alerts.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” text_size=”h6″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-124028″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”400″ subheading=”It’s frustrating not hearing back right away, but our team of recruiters works hard to find you the best possible opportunity and reach out as soon as it becomes available. In the meantime, check out our helpful resources, including blog posts, salary guides, and industry updates, for relevant tips for job seekers like you. “]Wait.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ position_horizontal=”right” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”400″ width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1487094666049{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ back_color=”color-wvjs” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1481908700467{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”” el_class=”.x-large-heading-resources scroll-fast”]

contract

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Check out our short-term job services.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGhyZWYlM0QlMjIlMkZoaXJlLWNvbnRyYWN0LWNvbnN1bHRhbnRzLWZyZWVsYW5jZXJzJTJGJTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJjdGElMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjBFeHBsb3JlJTIwTm93JTBBJTIwJTIwJTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIyQWZ0ZXJIb3ZlciUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRnNwYW4lM0UlMEElM0MlMkZkaXYlM0UlMEElM0MlMkZhJTNF[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ position_horizontal=”right” align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”” el_class=”.x-large-heading-news scroll-fast”]

full

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ desktop_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ desktop_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”4″ desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Learn about our full-time staffing services.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGhyZWYlM0QlMjIlMkZoaXJlLWZ1bGwtdGltZS1tYXJrZXRpbmctdGVjaC10YWxlbnQlMjIlM0UlMEElM0NkaXYlMjBjbGFzcyUzRCUyMmN0YSUyMiUzRSUwQSUyMCUyMENoZWNrJTIwSXQlMjBPdXQlMEElMjAlMjAlM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJBZnRlckhvdmVyJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUwQSUzQyUyRmRpdiUzRSUwQSUzQyUyRmElM0U=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
